languages.text: {n}Голос Ульфара звучит глухо и угрожающе.{/n} "Эттфатер... мое дело в этих катакомбах еще не окончено. Я не покину сии чертоги, пока не сражу Крик скверны. Коль хочешь — ступай без меня. Я вернусь, чтобы свершить воздаяние".

{n}Ulfar's voice is muffled and menacing.{/n} "Aett-Vater... My work in these catacombs is not yet done. I will not leave these halls until I have slain Doomscream. If you wish, go without me. I will return to exact my vengeance."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Ульфара звучит глухо и угрожающе.{/n} "Эттфатер... мое дело в этих катакомбах еще не окончено. Я не покину сии чертоги, пока не сражу Крик скверны. Коль хочешь — ступай без меня. Я вернусь, чтобы свершить воздаяние".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar's voice is muffled and menacing.{/n} "Aett-Vater... My work in these catacombs is not yet done. I will not leave these halls until I have slain Doomscream. If you wish, go without me. I will return to exact my vengeance."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar's voice is muffled and menacing.{/n} "Aett-Vater... My work in these catacombs is not yet done. I will not leave these halls until I have slain Doomscream. If you wish, go without me. I will return to exact my vengeance."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfars Stimme ist leise und bedrohlich.{/n} "Aett-Vater ... Meine Arbeit in diesen Katakomben ist noch nicht getan. Ich werde diese Hallen erst verlassen, wenn ich Unheilsschrei erschlagen habe. Wenn Ihr wollt, geht ohne mich. Ich werde zurückkehren, um Rache zu üben."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice is muffled and menacing.{/n} "Aett-Vater... My work in these catacombs is not yet done. I will not leave these halls until I have slain Doomscream. If you wish, go without me. I will return to exact my vengeance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfars Stimme ist leise und bedrohlich.{/n} "Aett-Vater ... Meine Arbeit in diesen Katakomben ist noch nicht getan. Ich werde diese Hallen erst verlassen, wenn ich Unheilsschrei erschlagen habe. Wenn Ihr wollt, geht ohne mich. Ich werde zurückkehren, um Rache zu üben."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法的声音低沉，充满威胁。{/n}“狼领……我在这片墓穴的任务还没有完成。在杀死‘灾啸’之前，我绝不会离开这个大厅。如果你愿意的话，你自己先走吧，我必须回去报这个仇。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice is muffled and menacing.{/n} "Aett-Vater... My work in these catacombs is not yet done. I will not leave these halls until I have slain Doomscream. If you wish, go without me. I will return to exact my vengeance."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法的声音低沉，充满威胁。{/n}“狼领……我在这片墓穴的任务还没有完成。在杀死‘灾啸’之前，我绝不会离开这个大厅。如果你愿意的话，你自己先走吧，我必须回去报这个仇。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voix d'Ulfar est étouffée, presque menaçante.{/n} « Aett-vater... Je n'en ai pas encore fini dans ces catacombes. Je ne quitterai pas ce lieu avant d'avoir tué le Fléau Hurlant. Partez sans moi, si c'est là votre souhait. Je reviendrai accomplir ma vengeance. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice is muffled and menacing.{/n} "Aett-Vater... My work in these catacombs is not yet done. I will not leave these halls until I have slain Doomscream. If you wish, go without me. I will return to exact my vengeance."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix d'Ulfar est étouffée, presque menaçante.{/n} « Aett-vater... Je n'en ai pas encore fini dans ces catacombes. Je ne quitterai pas ce lieu avant d'avoir tué le Fléau Hurlant. Partez sans moi, si c'est là votre souhait. Je reviendrai accomplir ma vengeance. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voz de Ulfar es callada y amenazadora.{/n} «Aett-Vater... No he terminado mi labor en estas catacumbas. No abandonaré estas salas hasta haber matado a Doomscream. Si quiere, continúe sin mi y volveré para cobrarme mi venganza».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice is muffled and menacing.{/n} "Aett-Vater... My work in these catacombs is not yet done. I will not leave these halls until I have slain Doomscream. If you wish, go without me. I will return to exact my vengeance."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Ulfar es callada y amenazadora.{/n} «Aett-Vater... No he terminado mi labor en estas catacumbas. No abandonaré estas salas hasta haber matado a Doomscream. Si quiere, continúe sin mi y volveré para cobrarme mi venganza».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは抑えつつも、威圧的な声で話す。{/n}「アエット＝ヴァテル…この地下墓地での俺の仕事はまだ終わっちゃいない。ドゥームスクリームを殺すまで、俺はここから離れはしない。お望みなら、俺抜きで進むがいい。俺は復讐のために戻るだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice is muffled and menacing.{/n} "Aett-Vater... My work in these catacombs is not yet done. I will not leave these halls until I have slain Doomscream. If you wish, go without me. I will return to exact my vengeance."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは抑えつつも、威圧的な声で話す。{/n}「アエット＝ヴァテル…この地下墓地での俺の仕事はまだ終わっちゃいない。ドゥームスクリームを殺すまで、俺はここから離れはしない。お望みなら、俺抜きで進むがいい。俺は復讐のために戻るだろう」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar'ın sesi, boğuk ve tehditkâr çıkıyor.{/n} "Aett-Vater... Bu mezarlardaki işim henüz bitmedi. Belanarası'nı katledene kadar buradan ayrılmayacağım. İstersen yoluna bensiz devam et. Geri dönüp intikamımı alacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice is muffled and menacing.{/n} "Aett-Vater... My work in these catacombs is not yet done. I will not leave these halls until I have slain Doomscream. If you wish, go without me. I will return to exact my vengeance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar'ın sesi boğuk ve tehditkâr çıkıyor.{/n} "Aett-Vater... Bu mezarlardaki işim henüz bitmedi. Belanarası'nı katledene kadar buradan ayrılmayacağım. İstersen yoluna bensiz devam et. İntikamımı almak için geri döneceğim."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
